pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.52: Sp.1.400: Sāṭakapattoti lohapattasadiso susaṇṭhāno succhavi siniddho bhamaravaṇṇo mattikāpatto vuccati, “Sāṭakapatta: what is meant is a clay bowl like an iron bowl, which is well-formed, has a nice and glossy surface, and has the color of a bee.” The color of a bee is black. Thig 13.1:1.1: Kāḷakā bhamaravaṇṇasādisā, “Black like the color of a bee.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.53: Sp.1.400: Sumbhakapattoti pakatimattikāpatto. , “Sumbhakapatta: an ordinary clay bowl.”
